author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
description:
Allows rendering (creating an image) of objects, layers and the scene to display in a sprite. 
This allows to make optimizations by transforming the resulting image of a shape painter into a faster sprite, or to make viewports/cameras.
name: RenderToSprite
shortDescription: Renders an object, layer, scene or an area of a scene and puts the resulting image into a sprite.

eventsFunctions.description: Renders an object and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render an object into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderObject

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a layer and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render a layer into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderLayer

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a scene and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render a scene into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderScene
eventsFunctions.sentence: Render the current scene into sprite _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a defined area of a scene and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render an area of a scene into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderSceneArea
eventsFunctions.sentence: Render the area of a current scene into Sprite: _PARAM1_, from OriginX: _PARAM2_, OriginY: _PARAM3_, with Width: _PARAM4_, Height: _PARAM5_

parameters.description: Origin X position of the render area
parameters.name: originPositionX

parameters.description: Origin Y Position of the render area
parameters.name: originPositionY

parameters.description: Width of the are to render
parameters.name: areaWidth

parameters.description: Height of the area to render
parameters.name: areaHeight
